name: Jikkyou Powerful Pro Yakyuu 2018
storyline:
Play a Real Game a Few Hours After it Occurs - Scenarios that reproduce real professional baseball games. A scenario will be distributed a few hours after the end of a professional baseball game. Difficulty level can be selected for a scenario and played as many times as you want! 
 
New Players are Instantly Supported - Drafts, free agents, and transfers that happened after the 2017 season are also supported. The latest player data will be recorded and there will be updates as necessary 
Turning Points - During a Live Scenario, missions can be challenged from the “turning points” that influence each game. Missions will have several clear conditions. Games during the pennant race and play-off scenarios will also be distributed 
 
Ranking - Clearing a mission will calculate your score. Things such as getting a batter out, throwing nice pitches, and your batting record will strengthen your score. Aim to earn the top score on the nationwide ranking
summary: Jikkyou Powerful Pro Baseball 2018 will include “Pawafuru Festival,” a mode that has been included with past entries where players battle through a tournament against Success characters of successive generations. The setting is an extravagant passenger boat called the “Queen of Festival.”
